tool_description: API for searching item on Mercari
name: mercari item search
title: mercari item search

api_list.name: show_item_by_id
api_list.description:
`item` api parameters:
- itemId: The item id you want to query. The item id is something like `m72639077322`, you can get it from the response of `items` API.

required_parameters.name: itemId
required_parameters.description: The id of the item to retrieve

api_list.name: list_items
api_list.description:
`items` api parameters:
- keyword: The keyword you want to query
- page: Which page you want to get (132 item per page)
- priceLow: Price range start from which price.
- priceHight: Price range to which price.
- itemStatus: Item status filter, you can choose one or multiple from
  ```NEW,ALMOST_NEW,NO_DAMAGES,FEW_DAMAGES,SOME_DAMAGES,BAD_CONDITION```
- delivery: Delivery type, you can choose one or multiple from
  ``` CASH_ON_DELIVERY,DELIVERY_COST_INCLUDED```
- saleStatus: Saling status, you can choose one or multiple from
  ```ON_SALE,SOLD_OUT```

required_parameters.name: keyword
required_parameters.description: The keyword you want to query

optional_parameters.name: saleStatus
optional_parameters.description: The item sale status filter, **please don't put any space between STATUS**

optional_parameters.name: itemStatus
optional_parameters.description: The item statuses filter, **please don't put any space between STATUS**

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page you want to get

optional_parameters.name: delivery
optional_parameters.description: The delivery types filter, **please don't put any space between DELIVERY_TYPEs**
